list.name: Changes
list.comment: feat: rename gateway webhook workflow to auth-svc webhook - Updated workflow file from gateway-webhook-dev.yaml to auth-svc-webhook-dev.yaml - Adjusted paths to reflect changes in service structure - Modified webhook authentication token for auth service

task.summary: feat: add initial Helm chart for auth-svc and share-infra - Introduced Chart.yaml and values.yaml for both auth-svc and share-infra - Added necessary templates including deployment, service, and configmap - Implemented autoscaling, liveness, and readiness probes for auth-svc - Added .helmignore files to exclude unnecessary files from packaging - Configured Kafka as a dependency for share-infra

feat: add initial Helm chart for user-svc (issue: dev) - Introduced Chart.yaml and values.yaml for user-svc - Added necessary templates including deployment, service, and configmap - Implemented autoscaling, liveness, and readiness probes for user-svc - Added .helmignore files to exclude unnecessary files from packaging - Configured PostgreSQL as a dependency for user-svc

feat: rename gateway webhook workflow to auth-svc webhook - Updated workflow file from gateway-webhook-dev.yaml to auth-svc-webhook-dev.yaml - Adjusted paths to reflect changes in service structure - Modified webhook authentication token for auth service
